page.title: 20EDUCATION - Lydham/More
page.content: As there are{no schools}here all twenty four children in full-time education have to{travel to Bishop's {Castle.}If the pupils live within 2 miles of the school a charge of Â£22 is made for the use of the school bus. Over this mileage there is no charge. {Adult evening classes}are run, some- times by the Women's Institute, in the Village Hall at Lydham. All{HEALTH CARE}outside the home is found nearby in Bishop's Castle. Doctors surgery, Dentist, Cottage Hospital and Pharmacist. The District Nurse visits many housebound people who are often cut-off through lack of transport in this area. Emergency hospital treatment, clinical treatment and X-rays must be sought at the Royal Shrewsbury Hospital -'Copthorne'- some 22 miles away. Lydham, More & Snead Women's Institute
